tossupQ:
PHYSICAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following is LEAST accurate regarding 
the element helium: 
 
W) it is the second most abundant element in the universe 
X) it is constantly escaping from Earth’s atmosphere into space 
Y) it is toxic to humans even in very low concentrations 
Z) it is a noble gas
tossupA: Y) IT IS TOXIC TO HUMANS EVEN IN VERY LOW CONCENTRATIONS

W) 1 large, fresh apple 
X) 1 large, baked potato 
Y) 1 cup raw spinach 
Z) 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil
bonusA:
Y) 1 CUP RAW SPINACH 
 
(Solution: apple ~ 125; potato ~ 220; spinach ~ 10; oil ~ 125)

tossupQ:
PHYSICAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following is NOT true: 
 
W) the freezing point of pure water is 0ºC at sea level 
X) when pure water freezes, it reaches its maximum density at 0ºC 
Y) adding salt to ice will lower its melting point 
Z) when pure maple syrup is cooled below 0ºC, pure water ice separates out
tossupA:
X) WHEN PURE WATER FREEZES, IT REACHES ITS MAXIMUM DENSITY AT 
0ºC 
 
(Solution: max density at ~4ºC)

Y) tide stations measure local sea levels
